v.v: “You people of Israel, I brought all your ancestors out of Egypt;
From all the people groups on the earth,
Two people certainly cannot walk together
A lion in a forest certainly does not roar
No one can catch a bird
Similarly, all the people in a city certainly become afraid
Whatever Yahweh plans to do,
Everyone certainly becomes terrified when they hear a lion roar;
Proclaim to the people who guard the strongholds in Ashdod,
Yahweh says that the people there do not know how to do things that are right.

v: so listen to what I am saying about you.
I chose and took care of only you.
That is the reason that I will punish you
for the sins that you have committed.”
if they have not already agreed what place they will start walking from.
if it has not killed another animal.
It does not growl in its den
if it is not eating the flesh of an animal that it has caught.
if he does not set a trap for it.
A trap does not spring shut
when some animal has not sprung the trap.
when they hear someone blowing a trumpet
to signal that enemies are attacking.
And when a city experiences disaster,
Yahweh is the one who has caused it.
he tells his prophets about it.
Yahweh the Lord has given messages to prophets,
they certainly must proclaim those messages,
even though they terrify people.
and to those who protect the fortresses in the land of Egypt, and say this,
“Come together on the hills of Samaria,
and see how much the people in that city are frightened,
and see the way the people are suffering because of what they are doing to each other!”
Their homes are filled with valuable things that they have stolen or taken violently from others.

v.v: So Yahweh our God says that soon their enemies will come

v: and tear down their defenses
and take away those valuable things.

v.v: Yahweh has declared this:

v: “When a lion attacks a sheep,
sometimes a shepherd is able to snatch from the lion’s mouth
only two legs or an ear of the sheep.
Similarly, only a few people from Samaria will escape,
just as if someone could save only a part of a couch or a bed from a fire in the house.”U

v.v: Yahweh, commander of the angel armies, says this:
When I, Yahweh, punish the people of Israel
I will cause the houses that they live in during the winter to be torn down;
You wealthy women of Samaria who have grown fat like the fat cows of the region of Bashan.
But Yahweh our God has said this:
Your enemies will drag you out
Go ahead: go to the hilltop places of idol worship that are at Bethel and Gilgal, where many people worship me;
Bring offerings of bread to thank me,
I am the one who caused there to be no food in any of your cities and towns,
When it was still three months before the time of harvesting crops,
Your people would stagger from one town to another town to find water,
Many times I struck your crops with disease and mildew.
I caused you to experience plagues
I got rid of many of you,
So now, you people of Israel, I am going to punish you.
I created the mountains,

v: “Proclaim this message about the descendants of Jacob:
because of the sins that they have committed,
I will cause the altars at the town of Bethel to be destroyed;
even the projections at the corners of the altars will be cut off and fall to the ground.
and the houses they live in during the summer, they will also be torn down.
Beautiful big houses and houses that are decorated with ivory will be destroyed.
That will surely happen because I, Yahweh, have said it!”
